title: WebXR — Virtual and Augmented Reality for the Web
summary: The concepts of virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) aren't new, but the technology is more accessible than ever. We can also use a JavaScript API to make use of it in web applications. This article introduces WebXR from the perspective of its use in games.
